recommended_degree: Administrasi Logistik, Manajemen Logistik dan Material, Logistik Perdagangan Internasional (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in receiving, recording, and issuing materials, tools, and consumables.
- Support daily inventory updates and maintain accurate stock data.
- Help label, arrange, and organize warehouse materials to ensure easy traceability.
- Assist with periodic stock checks and report discrepancies to the Storekeeper.
- Perform general warehouse administration support tasks.
